Items.Name: Boss Hold
Items.Description: Holds cooldowns at 15 percent boss HP

Items.Name: Group Hold
Items.Description: Holds cooldowns at 40 percent enemy HP

Items.Name: Enable CDs
Items.Description: Reenables all cooldowns turned off by hold toggles on full HP targets

Items.Name: Last Boss
Items.Description: Enables burn boss at low HP for last boss of dungeon/raid. Disables dot as well.
